title: Messed up my back real bad when running to catch the bus
body:
I was just running when suddenly my back just shoots an immense wave of pain all throughout my lower back, almost causing me to fall over. I didn't actually fall, but holy crap.. I'm almost in tears with how bad this hurts.

I wasn't supposed to work today, but they called me in before to just cover for 4 hours, but I can't lift anything now. I can barely walk. I can't sit up straight. There's no one else that can come in to take my place.

I managed to convince the in charge to let me go home at 6, rather than 8. So only 2 hours.. but this is the longest 2 hours I've ever had to endure. 

Back pain is the worst, you guys. Take care of your back.
